short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Animals love Tab is a Chrome Extension for the New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Animals Love New tab - set your new tab with the greatest animals photos


Animals Love New tab - By Advertis Tech SRL
Using the extension allows you to see clocks and times from leading countries in the world.
In addition, using the extension allows you to manage and write personal notes and comments (by clicking on the extension icon).

In addition, the Animals love new tab provides look and feel of the top Animals Love photos. Get fast and easy access to lovely and cute animal photos. The Animals Love new tab Includes a clock that displays the date and time
The search features used within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing; however, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.
By installing the Animals Love New tab Chrome extension you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy. 
End User License Agreement - https://animalslove.info/terms-and-conditions.html
Privacy Policy - https://animalslove.info/Privacy-policy.html

How to remove this extension from your Chrome?
You can open your Chrome browser’s Settings and find our extension on the Extensions page. Click on the “Remove” button, and it will be completely removed. Alternatively, you can right-click on the extension’s icon on your browser, and select “Remove from Chrome” from the drop-down menu.
